sentences.en: "Go on, don't leave us in suspense," Dennis said.
sentences.cn: 丹尼斯说：“接着说，别吊我们胃口了。”

sentences.en: Bassanio waited in dreadful suspense the event of the trial.
sentences.cn: 巴萨尼奥忧心如焚地等候着这场审判的结果.

sentences.en: Come on then, tell me what happened; the suspense is killing me (= I feel very excited or anxious because I do not know what will happen next ) .
sentences.cn: 快来，告诉我发生了什么事。急死我了。

sentences.en: He carried his concentrated burden and his perpetual suspense.
sentences.cn: 他独自负荷着沉重的负担,长期怀着惴惴不安的心情.

sentences.en: He wished to make the most of the occasion, maintaining the suspense.
sentences.cn: 他想充分利用这场合, 保持这紧张的局面.

sentences.en: He wouldn't tell them, but kept them in suspense all day.
sentences.cn: 他不吐实情, 害得他们整日悬虑.
令人毛骨悚然的气氛使旁观者们目瞪口呆.

sentences.en: I wait with suspense, with positive excitement.
sentences.cn: 我焦虑地等着, 心里还挺紧张.

sentences.en: Oh, tell me, don'tkeep me in suspense.
sentences.cn: 呵, 告诉我, 别让我挂念.

sentences.en: She couldn’t bear the suspense a moment longer.
sentences.cn: 这样提心吊胆，她再也受不了了。

sentences.en: The director used ingenious devices to keep the audience in suspense.
sentences.cn: 导演用巧妙手法引起观众的悬念.

sentences.en: The suspense over the two remaining hostages ended last night when the police discovered the bullet ridden bodies.
sentences.cn: 随着昨晚警方发现了弹痕累累的尸体，人们对剩余两名人质的担心也终告结束。
这样提心吊胆的状况实在叫人受不了.

sentences.en: They waited in suspense to hear the end of the story.
sentences.cn: 他们着急地等待着听故事的结局.

sentences.en: We waited in great suspense for the doctor's diagnosis.
sentences.cn: 我们焦急万分地等候医生做出诊断。

sentences.en: We waited in great suspense for the doctor's opinion.
sentences.cn: 我们焦急万分地等候医生做出诊断.

sentences.en: William's appearance had only added to the intensity of this suspense.
sentences.cn: 威廉的出现也不过更增加了他心头的渺茫.

trans.tran_cn: 悬而未决，含糊不定，焦虑，挂念，悬念，中止，暂停
trans.tran_en: a feeling of excitement or anxiety when you do not know what will happen next
